name: Can't play
description:
This is my first game, I have created the game just in 2 hours.

This is copy of Flappy Bird, i tried to make the game look best but i don't know what i have done made a shitty a** game and wasted my 2 hours, but whatever this was my first try, hope you will enjoy.

It's completely free so go and download the shitty game and enjoy . And yeh thanks for downloading the game if you did. 

 

                                COMING SOON WITH MORE "FSGS"
